text: Princess Michael of Kent (born Baroness Marie-Christine Anna Agnes Hedwig Ida von Reibnitz, 15 January 1945) is a member of the British royal family. She is married to Prince Michael of Kent, who is a grandson of King George V. ==Career== Princess Michael of Kent was an interior designer before becoming an author. She has written several books on European royalty. ===Written works=== * * * * * * * ==Health== In 2002, she was treated for skin cancer. In May 2021, it was reported that Princess Michael was suffering from blood clots after being diagnosed with COVID-19 six months earlier. ==References== ==Other websites== * Princess Michael of Kent's official website * Prince and Princess Michael of Kent at the Royal Family website Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:British princesses Category:House of Windsor Category:British writers
title: Princess Michael of Kent
